## Semantic Search

### Set a default embedding model

``` bash
llm embed-models default text-embedding-3-small
```

### Embed some data

``` bash
llm embed-multi followers followers.json --store
```

### "Fuzzy search" the embedded data

``` bash
llm similar followers -c "data science" -n 5

# Chain commands to "chat with your data"
llm similar followers -c "fine-tuning" | llm "Which of my followers is the best person to ask about fine-tuning?"
```
